website_summaries.verdict: Two folding tires by a top brand. Suitable for on- and off-road use and the budget-conscious biking enthusiast.
pros: Impressive performance, excellent durability, and decent grip in most conditions
Also a great bargain, as you get two tires for the price
cons: Can be difficult to put on rims
Rare reports of tires with manufacturing defects

customer_reviews.title: Tire pressure is the key to performance with these tires ...
customer_reviews.text: Tire pressure is the key to performance with these tires. Was at 110 PSI and I was actually going slower than my old tires. After doing some research online I changed psi to 75 in the front and 90 in the rear. This added 2 mph to my speed
customer_reviews.author: David James

customer_reviews.title: Great looking tires and well made!
customer_reviews.text: There were some reviews saying these were very tight and hard to get on. Road bike tires do take some elbow grease (along with tire tools) to get them on. These were no harder to put on than any other road bike tires. As with all Continental tires, these are well made and the blue stripe looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: great basic, durable, long riding tire
customer_reviews.text: I have ridden most of the brands and models of all kinds of tires. I stick with Contis now. I use the All Seasons most of the year, and Ultra Sport ll for the summer months. The are plenty fast, and responsive, and wear a long time. They go on easy every time. I ride a lot and am not going to buy fancy light weight tires that feel just slightly better for a ton of cash and have them wear out or puncture in half the time. For rough roads and city use I go with the All Seasons or Gatorskins. Superb tires! .
customer_reviews.author: Micycle

customer_reviews.title: ... and not get caught up in this "only the best for me" slip stream
customer_reviews.text: When you want to keep things on a budget and not get caught up in this "only the best for me" slip stream, THESE TIRES KICK ASS !!!!! They last for the duration and I'm not robbing the bank account to keep my bikes outfitted with good tires. I haven't experienced not one flat through the last 6 sets of these tires and each set racked up close to 3 to 3500 miles before I decided to change them out and some of my counter parts took those tires and are still riding on them !!!!!!!!!! WTH, what more could you ask for out of a product at that price ??!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cannondale Phreek

customer_reviews.title: Very tight fit
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use tires on the road yet as they are extremely tight on the rim and I've pinched 2 tubes putting them on. The quality appears great however and I received them quickly from the seller. Would be 5 stars if they weren't so difficult to put on the rim. So, just know you will probably need help putting them on or will need baby powder and lots of patience to get the tires on without pinching the tubes..
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Cheap tire that's very difficult to install without trashing tubes
customer_reviews.text: Giving this a one for two reasons. This tire is being sold at performance bike website for $19. Second I've trashed two tubes trying to install this. I've changed many, many tires in my decades of cycling and have never had to go through three (hopefully just three) tubes to get the tire on the rim. This difficulty would be easier to stomach in a high-end racing tire -- it's unacceptable in a mid-grade recreational tire. I would have returned them if I had not trashed the packaging getting the tires out. If you are OK with a mid-grade recreational tire, I recommend you choose a different tire that doesn't have the installation issues.
customer_reviews.author: David in Az

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: There's several reviews on how hard these are to install - I rolled mine on w/o tools and no problems. They fitted up like the other thousand tires I have put on my road bike - Mavic 700cc rims. I hate to see something get bad reviews due to operator error - these fit like all the other Continental tires I used over the last 40 yrs and time will tell if they hold up. They were a great value, even if they last only a thousand miles or so!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good Commuter Tires
customer_reviews.text: I've been riding on these tires for several months now with no problems. They were easy to mount, roll true, can be inflated to 100 PSI, and seem to have low rolling resistance. Because the profile of the wheel is semi- circular, they seem stable cornering as well. The tire is basically a slick, so I don't think these tires would be good in wet weather. Overall, I think these tires are a good deal and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Tough to install, but perform well
customer_reviews.text: These tires are very difficult to mount onto my stock Syncros wheels on my Scott. I've never had issues removing tires, changing tubes, etc, but these guys were practically impossible for me to throw on! I resorted to a mechanic at an event I attended, and the first one couldn't get it (he was older, and said that he didn't have the strength to make it work), but the younger one was able to muscle it on. I'm hoping the tires loosen up a bit over time, but I'm really dreading the day I get a flat and have to deal with this tire again. The price is great though, and they performed just fine on a long ride yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: mainly wanted to comment that they went on super easy for me (not a bike mechanic by any ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got my pair today, mainly wanted to comment that they went on super easy for me (not a bike mechanic by any stretch). Don't know why some reviews say they're hard to get on. Only 20 miles so far, but I like them so far, took some fast turns and they seem super stable and grippy. Will update once I get some more miles on them, but for the price they seem awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Young

customer_reviews.title: Tires were hard to install (from folding) but work nice
customer_reviews.text: Went up to 32s on my All-City, loving the wider tire. The tires were a huge pain to get on the rim from being folded in the box, it'd probably be best to let them sit out in the sun and un-crease a little bit before you try to put them on. Been running fine for the last couple hundred miles on my commuter bike.
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: Best value for your money.
customer_reviews.text: Very fast rolling and good road feel. Can't say anything about the puncture resistance since I run these tubeless but they've been reliable on all of my bikes so far. For the money you can't really do any better than this for a budget road bike tire. Only problem with these is that it's a pain to get onto a rim but otherwise they've been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Daddy Yambao

customer_reviews.title: Better than stock tires on new Trek
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought a new Trek Domane that came with Bontrager stock tires. The stock tires are trash. Threw on these and took 2 50 mile rides. Much better grip on wet surfaces. Ride quality is excellent. For the price these are excellent tires. They are a tight fit and take some elbow grease to get on like most Contis I’ve installed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Industry standard?
customer_reviews.text: Well the new rubber can at times warp when being placed on for the first time and it took 3 or 4 tries to even out the warp--i know its rubber but is it how its packed, that was annoying and wasted quite a bit of time otherwise still love gators no punctures in 3 years:)
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Njenga Njoroge

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tires thinking I might need them in a year. Well the other brand tire i had exploded and I had a new one in stock and got it replaced. Good timing and planning. Very inexpensive and running great for many miles so far with continental.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy bob

customer_reviews.title: Hold up well.
customer_reviews.text: I've so far put in a couple of hundreds of miles on them. Super light, Like any tire, they are a bit tough to put on. Make sure to have the right tools when installing and not pinch the inner tube. Deff recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great Price Performers
customer_reviews.text: I have been running Conti's for over 20 years and the Ultra Sports have been my go-to tires for the past few years. There are definitely some higher quality tires available, but for my limited funds, these are the tires best tires for me. I tend to get about 3000 miles after each tire.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S

customer_reviews.title: Great quality tires
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tires to replace some old kenda tires. I usually by gators but this pair of ultra sports worked out nice. Yes the tires fit tight but simply leave them in the sun a few hours and then they install easily.
customer_reviews.author: David V.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap . Easy install. Decent road feel.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a continental tire user. For the price ; this is a good tire. It doesn’t have that exquisite feel of top level but at 28mm it’s comfy. Measures out at 28mm . No punctures for 500 miles. 37$ for two, give em a try. Super easy to install on Mavic rims.
customer_reviews.author: matthew mueller

customer_reviews.title: Durability and no flats.
customer_reviews.text: Yes the tires will surprise you ; they did me; they last long enough, about 1 flat in 2500 miles , good performance, have to be cautious in wet pavement, since they are a no grip thread tire, but is basically the same with any other tire. I recommend it as I have tested the tires, this past two years, so they qualify as real good tires.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: After couple of months, tires falling apart. This could of been really bad if brake on the race. See pictures for yourself. Don't waist your money on the junk.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Dorszewski

customer_reviews.text: I didn't get to know how they feel. I had ordered these in my exact size, 700x28c, but they were several sizes too-big. I don't understand. There was no way those huge tires going to fit on my sleek, slim rims.
customer_reviews.author: Amuse4god

customer_reviews.title: Nice tires
customer_reviews.text: Yes, they are difficult to put on the first time but if you are careful and use proper tire tools it is not a problem. I have been using Continental tires for a long time now and am more than satisfied with there performance.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: Continental Ultra Sport folding tires are special
customer_reviews.text: The Continental Ultra Sport tires are nice. Light, durable, and great grip. But the folding Continental Ultra Sport tires are feather-weight light. I put these on my Cannondale.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Reviews

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable and grip the road well
customer_reviews.text: These tires are well worth the price. I use them for a season of riding then replace in the springtime. They are very comfortable and grip the road well.
customer_reviews.author: Lifeisgood

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and not too hard to put on
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good tire for the price and it took about 10 to 15 minutes to put on. I needed a tire lever to work it on to the rim. It fits very well.
customer_reviews.author: rrock

customer_reviews.title: it's a name you can trust
customer_reviews.text: I have never been disappointed with Conti. They have a full product line to meet specific and general needs.
customer_reviews.author: hopley

customer_reviews.title: Can be difficult to put on.
customer_reviews.text: Have to take a star off, since the size seems to be a little inconsistent. The first one went on like a dream, the second however I really struggled with. I put these on a pair of Shimano wheels.
customer_reviews.author: George Grote

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement tires.
customer_reviews.text: I got these to replace my old tires same brand. Gets great grip and has a smooth ride once installed.
customer_reviews.author: Bedonie Whitetail

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Tires are good, apparently Ultra Sport II is not labeled on the side, I mistakenly thought they were plain Ultra Sports.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tire for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great tire for the value. Matched with slime tubes they are the perfect tire for AZ road riding.
customer_reviews.author: Aric Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great tires!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased wit this purchase. The tires roll very well, yet have great traction without any discernible rolling resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Dan W.

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Did not get the correct tires.Got two continental ultra sport III,700×25c.Ordered two continental ultra sport II,25c.Two different tires we didn't notice until the bike shop put them on.I already rode on them.Please pay attention on our orders.Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great tires for a great price
customer_reviews.text: great tires for a great price. They were really tight on my Mavic Aksiums and I broke a plastic tire lever trying to put them on but got it eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Good Times

customer_reviews.title: Dependability
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about Conti's. No matter what your use you can count on them to deliver. Quality, traction mileage.
customer_reviews.author: Biking Bri & my pal Milo

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Tires were supposed to be a 1 day delivery. It took 2 days. Tires are nice, but extremely hard to get on rim, compare to my previous set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality tires
customer_reviews.text: Good tires especially for the price. I have used more expensive tires and these measure up to the same performance.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade from stock tires
customer_reviews.text: Great tires. first quality in retail packaging. Nice upgrade from Schwalbe lugano stock tires.
customer_reviews.author: RPH

customer_reviews.title: Great ride and looks.
customer_reviews.text: The feel is good but depending on where you ride the flat protection is just OK.
customer_reviews.author: VeeDubb

customer_reviews.title: New tires
customer_reviews.text: Packages arrived intact, have not mounted yet but they appear to be of high quality
customer_reviews.author: Boogscoot

customer_reviews.title: Great long race tire for smooth to rough road conditions
customer_reviews.text: Tires did great on my recent Ironman. I noticed a marked difference over my training tires (Armadillo anti-flats) as you'd expect.
customer_reviews.author: RJK

customer_reviews.title: defective
customer_reviews.text: I received this inner tube and it has a leak. I was unable to return for some reason. I will not order items from out of country again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the tires. Faster and less rolling resistance than the stock Schwalbe Lugano: that came with my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Paolo

customer_reviews.title: Good grip and low rolling resistance
customer_reviews.text: Great grip and low rolling resistance, I’ve put about 80 miles on them and I’m happy. The only downside is the puncture resistance... not the best in its category but the price is right!
customer_reviews.author: Lanie

customer_reviews.title: Must be made for indoor use.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy if you’re riding on street or paved roads. Didn’t last 3 days, front tire sidewall tear and rear flat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these tires excellent quality tires for a great price what more can you ask for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality tires delivered promptly
customer_reviews.text: The Continentals were delivered promptly, have been installed and are riding smooth. A good price and saved me a trip to the bike store.
customer_reviews.author: JJP

customer_reviews.title: It’s good quality
customer_reviews.text: The tube is good quality but one of the tube was already busted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I was able to skid without too much damage to the tires. I hope to continue enjoying these.
customer_reviews.author: David O.

customer_reviews.title: Nearly as good as Gatorskins.
customer_reviews.text: Saved a few bucks and bought these instead of Gatorskins. They are highly rated. The only difference I could ascertain from the reviews was the mileage you will get. Gatorskins are double, but these should deliver about 2K. That's a couple years for me.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Martin

customer_reviews.title: ... these for a couple of months and I really like them. No problems with traction in the rain ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a couple of months and I really like them. No problems with traction in the rain and they don't show any signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: leestra66

customer_reviews.title: Is this normal?
customer_reviews.text: Just totally out of curiosity, is it normal for the tires to have the two dimples there? It looks like an eraser after someone poked it twice with a pen. Sorry this isn't exactly a product review, but this seemed like the best way to get various ideas about what's going on.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: The tires are okay, they both have identical tiny ...
customer_reviews.text: The tires are okay, they both have identical tiny manufacturing defect holes on the top of the tread area, clearly a weak spot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best tires
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tires. If your looking for some good commuter tires buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Blair Thomas

customer_reviews.title: They not only hug the road comfortably but I felt the impact of a smooth rotation ...
customer_reviews.text: I used these tires to replace my original ones and could tell the immediate difference in my first ride. They not only hug the road comfortably but I felt the impact of a smooth rotation from the tires and it gave minimal vibration from the harsh road conditions I normally traverse over. I will be purchasing an extra pair immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D. Banks

customer_reviews.title: tires
customer_reviews.text: Nice tires for what I need at a good price
customer_reviews.author: Max Luick

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: i just got them and a little sharp stone whent in them 2 times
customer_reviews.author: Anthony L Poole

product_meta.title: Continental Ultra Sport II Road Bike Folding Tires
product_meta.description: Based on activated silica compounds, this technology was originally intended as an performance level compound, but after intensive development at our Korbach Research and Development Department Facility, an advanced new compound with outstanding grip and cross-country properties was developed. This new rubber mix, given the self explanatory name “PureGrip”, is ranked just behind our BlackChili Compound and is being used in our performance products both in the road and mountain bike sectors. Whilst providing great grip, it is also long lasting and highly durable – both characteristics of Continental tires, which are exclusively manufactured in the factory in Hefei (Asia).
feature_bullets: Established all-round tire with Continental's well-known level of quality
Proven Continental racing tire design for responsive handling and secure grip
Excellent grip and high mileage thanks to PureGrip Compound

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
